text: Author of the popular young adult series has issued an apology for being ‘ part of the problem ’ in the wake of anonymous claims posted online James Dashner, author of the bestselling young adult Maze Runner books, has issued an apology in which he says that he “ will seek counselling and guidance ” after he was accused of sexual harassment. He has also been dropped by his US publisher, Penguin Random House. The anonymous allegations were made online on Sunday, in the comments section of a piece about sexual harassment in the children ’ s books world, published by the US trade magazine School Library Journal. Several accused Dashner of sexual harassment ; one comment alleged that the “ harassment / abuse from James Dashner was not a one - time unwanted touch or a joke I took the wrong way.
